title: Season 3, Ep 9 - Sorcerer (w/ Mike Hanford of Questions For Lennon)
description:
The army is joined by a sorcerer with a hard to determine amount of power. Also, sorcerers are totally different from wizards.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Usidore: Matt Young

Trinkle the Sorcerer: Mike Hanford

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Matt Young, and Adal Rifai

Post-Production Coordination: Garrett Schultz

Earwolf Producer: Kimmie Lucas

Editor: Stephen Dranger

Special Assistance: Ryan DiGiorgi

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Theme Music: Andy Poland
